Package edu.rit.crypto

Package edu.rit.crypto contains cryptographic components used in the M2MI Library and the M2MP Library.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
MuH1 Class MuH1 provides the compression function for the MicroHash-One (μH-1) 32-bit one-way hash function.
MuH1MessageDigest Class MuH1MessageDigest provides a message digest algorithm using the MicroHash-One (μH-1) 32-bit one-way hash function.
MuH1Random Class MuH1Random provides a pseudorandom number generator (PRNG) based on the MicroHash-One (μH-1) 32-bit one-way hash function.
 

Package edu.rit.crypto Description

Package edu.rit.crypto contains cryptographic components used in the M2MI Library and the M2MP Library.
